description: Carves a cave through the world in the current chunk, and in every chunk around the current chunk in an 8 radial pattern. This feature only works when placed in the pass "pregeneration_pass".

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The name of this feature in the form 'namespace_name:feature_name'. 'feature_name' must match the filename.

fields.title: Width Modifier
fields.description: How many blocks to increase the cave radius by, from the center point of the cave.

fields.title: Skip Carve Chance
fields.description: The chance to skip doing the carve (1 / value).

fields.title: Height Limit
fields.description: The height limit where we attempt to carve.
